name: VtM - Blood of the Dragon
description:
You are a vampire with a very special power. One with a rather unpleasant reputation, but you intend to use it for good. Yours is the skill of fleshcrafting: the power to mold flesh, bone, and skin into new shapes.

With this you have begun to make a career providing an unparalleled level of plastic surgery to the denizens of L.A. But such miracles draw attention, and how long will it be before your past catches up with you?

--Created for the 2021 Vampire the Masquerade Game Jam. This is my first game, and while the main storyline is complete (with two endings), I wasn't able to include as many branching choices or subplots as I originally hoped. I'd love to hear what you think.--

--Stand by for audio narration track, coming soon--
